content:
+ kartthaavinte bahumaanam thalsthhaanatthu ennekkum vaazhtthappettathaakunnu.
+ kartthaavinte bahumaanam thalsthhaanatthu ennekkum vaazhtthappettathaakunnu.
+ kartthaavinte bahumaanam thalsthhaanatthu ennennekkum vaazhtthappettathaakunnu.

Vishuddhiyum mahatthvavumulllla thrithvame! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
Vishuddhiyum mahatthvavumulllla thrithvame! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
Vishuddhiyum mahatthvavumulllla thrithvame! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.

Nee ennekkum vishuddhiyum mahatthvavumullllavanaakunnu.
Nee ennekkum vishuddhiyum mahatthvavumullllavanaakunnu.
Nee ennennekkum vishuddhiyum mahatthvavumullllavanum ninte thirunaamam vaazhtthappettathumaakunnu.

Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi.
Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi.
Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume! Ninakku sthuthi.
